body.name: LED Desk Lamp, Architect lamp with Clamp，Remote Control Computer Desk Light Bright Desktop Light 100 Lighting Modes Dimmable Clamp Desk Lighting for Home Office with Adjustable Gooseneck, Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Energy Saving & Eye Care】Our eye care desk light is composed of 100 high-quality lamp beads, it consumes a remarkable 85% less energy than traditional incandescent lamps. This clip lamp experience uniform brightness, a wide lighting range, and an absence of bothersome strobes, blue light hazards, and glare. Our table lamp emits soft, eye-friendly light that safeguards your eyesight and minimizes eye fatigue even during extended periods of use.

【Remote Control & Multifunction】This desk lamps for office is equipped with a wireless smart remote control, allowing you to choose the most suitable mode faster and more portable. It also owns two special functions (memory function and timing function ). The memory function can keep the architect desk lamp in the last used mode and brightness without resetting. The timer function can make the led table lamp turn off automatically after working for 1 hour, preventing us from overworking.

【Versatile Lighting】The LED desk light can be easily switched between 5 brightness levels and 3 color temperatures (2700K-6500K) with the button on top, providing you with healthy and comfortable office lighting. Different lights fit the needs of different scenes. Memory function will remember your last setting.

【Highly Flexible Goose-Neck & Space Saving】 14-inch bendable goose-neck that allows you to aim the beam of light directly where you need it most, with adjustable working height 15.7-23.6 inch, this overhead computer desk lamp works perfect to accommodate large monitor and workstation, and C-clamp that only take up a little space to clamp-onto desk (Max thickness 1.77 inch) which can easily fit it in compact spaces.

【24/7 Quality Service】Our LED desk lamp has good heat dissipation, long service life, energy saving and power saving, no need to replace frequently. Our export products are 100% quality inspected, please rest assured of our product quality. We promise to provide a 365-day warranty for the product, if you encounter any problems during use, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with the best solution in the shortest possible time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This desk light works. Fit perfect on my desk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enhancing Workspace Comfort
reviews.reviewText: Having had a damaged base on my original desk lamp, I decided to invest in the POHO LED Desk Lamp. This lamp has proven to be a practical and modern addition to my workspace. With features and a sleek design, it has greatly improved my overall lighting experience.Equipped with a remote control function and an array of lighting effects, the POHO LED desk lamp allows me to effortlessly switch between various modes, catering to different needs. The dimmable setting further adds flexibility, enabling precise brightness adjustments for diverse and comfortable workspaces.The clip design of this table lamp is incredibly convenient, offering the flexibility to move and fix it wherever needed, whether on desks, bedside tables, headboards, dining tables, and more. This space-saving solution complements its modern aesthetic. The adjustable gooseneck enhances its versatility, allowing me to position the light exactly where I want, reducing eye strain during extended work sessions.In conclusion, the POHO LED Desk Lamp has brought both convenience and aesthetic appeal to my life, making it an excellent choice for those seeking an efficient and stylish lighting solution for their workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy Little Desk Companion
reviews.reviewText: Clipping onto the edge of my desk with the grace of a ballet dancer, this LED desk lamp didn't steal any of my precious desk real estate. Before, it felt like my eyes were doing a marathon, but now? It's a whole different story. With the gentle touch of a button, I can adjust the light to just the right level. It's like having a little guardian angel for my eyes, keeping the fatigue at bay. I'm pretty smitten with it, honestly. It's not just a lamp; it's a bit of a lifesaver. No more squinting at the screen, no more rubbing tired eyes. It's simple, unassuming, and just does its job without any fuss. It is dependable, and in the wee hours of the night, that's exactly what I need. Just a steady, comforting glow, keeping me company as I power through my work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I am very satisfied with this Computer Desk Light. I had no problem setting it up and using it immediately. The clamp is made of metal, making it very sturdy and durable. It has many models and I can adjust the brightness depending on different scenes. It has a remote control, which makes it very easy to use. I put the remote control on my nightstand and I can easily turn on and turn off the light. No complaints, it's exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars worth the investment
reviews.reviewText: The LED desk lamp with a highly designed architect-style and a clip design perfectly meets my needs. Its clamp design allows it to be easily attached to the table without occupying additional space. The lamp head can rotate 360 degrees, allowing me to adjust the direction of the light as needed, ensuring that the light is focused on the desired area. The remote control function makes it easy for me to switch between different lighting modes, offering a wide variety of options. The dimming function is also very convenient, allowing me to adjust the brightness according to my needs, meeting the requirements of different working environments and protecting my eyesight. The sleek appearance design is very fashionable, and this LED desk lamp completely fulfills my expectations, making it the ideal lighting choice for my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for Students
reviews.reviewText: This LED desk lamp has a very practical clamp design and can be easily fixed on a desktop or other flat surface, which is very convenient. Its 5-level dimming function allows me to adjust the light intensity according to my needs, which is very user-friendly. In addition, the gooseneck swing arm design also allows me to use the desk lamp at different angles, which is very comfortable. Most importantly, this desk lamp is completely free of flicker, glare and blue light issues, making it very safe and comfortable to use. The appearance of this table lamp is also very exquisite, and it looks very beautiful when placed on the table. In addition, its power supply is also very convenient and can be directly plugged into the socket for use, which is very worry-free. This LED desk lamp is a very excellent lighting tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This desk lamp has become an indispensable addition to my workspace, elevating both functionality and aesthetics. The sleek and modern design effortlessly complements my desk, adding a touch of sophistication. The adjustable brightness levels cater to various tasks and moods, from focused work to ambient lighting during relaxed moments. The flexible gooseneck allows me to direct the light precisely where I need it, reducing eye strain during extended work hours. The touch-sensitive controls add a convenient and intuitive element, eliminating the need for fumbling with switches. The energy-efficient LED bulbs not only provide ample illumination but also reduce electricity costs and contribute to a more sustainable setup. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: This desk lamp I set up for my daughter's study area. It's this neat little thing that doesn't scream for attention but does its job pretty well. It is easy to install. It's adjustable, which is great because my daughter likes to move it around depending on what she's doing. Sometimes she's drawing, other times she's reading, and this lamp just goes with the flow. The light it gives off is kind of soft, not that harsh, glaring type that makes you squint. It's like a gentle nudge to focus rather than a blinding spotlight. We've been using it for a while now, and I've noticed it's just the right size for her small desk. Not too big, not too small, just right.
